customer: customers a left join sourceaccounts b on a.sourceaccount = b.id

transactionsum: transactionsum a left join sourceAccounts b on a.sourceaccount = b.id
(case a.status when 0 then '未上传' when 1 then '融宝处理中' when 2 then '银行处理中' when 3 then '成功' when -2 then '失败'  when -3 then '暂停结算' end)

transaction: transactionlogs a join  customers b on b.terminal = a.terminal and b.status>-1 left join sourceAccounts c on b.sourceaccount = c.id
